content: I apologize for any confusion my previous response may have caused. Upon further research, it appears that the Toilevator is no longer available for purchase from the manufacturer's website ([www.gosafe.com](http://www.gosafe.com)) or their authorized distributors. As a result, the website no longer contains information about the Toilevator, including installation instructions or product specifications. However, there may be other websites or resources available that provide information about the Toilevator and its use. It is recommended to consult with a healthcare professional or accessibility expert for advice and guidance on selecting and using mobility aids and equipment.
